abstract: New York City Council Speaker Melissa Mark-Viverito outlines budget proposal that would spend $68.7 million to add 1,000 officers to the New York Police Dept; council receives letter signed by nearly five dozen organizations questioning wisdom of proposal.
lead_paragraph: Nearly five dozen organizations attached their names to a letter sent to the speaker, Melissa Mark-Viverito, opposing her proposal to add 1,000 officers to the force.

headline.main: City Council Speaker Draws Ire of Allies on Police Hiring
headline.print_headline: City Council Speaker Draws Ire of Allies on Police Hiring

snippet: Nearly five dozen organizations attached their names to a letter sent to the speaker, Melissa Mark-Viverito, opposing her proposal to add 1,000 officers to the force.
